MemeDef.label: chastity
MemeDef.description: To live virtuously, one must have a pure mind and body alike. Giving into basal urges is equal to forfeiting one's morality.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Chastity) ->[deity0_name] first created [clearThing], and only later created life, so that its basal needs may provide a proper contrast.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Chastity) ->[deity0_name] created carnal desire in a fit of weakness, and regretted it when humanity lost themselves in it.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Chastity) ->[deity0_name] blessed [deity0_possessive] followers with water, so that they may cleanse themselves of their gross desires.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Chastity) ->[deity0_name] spoke to the [memberNamePlural]: "Shame be upon you! Shame! Cleanse yourself of this grossness!"

intro(tag=meme_Chastity) ->Most of the people of [place_summary] [place_name] were lustful and preoccupied with daily life, but the [memberNamePlural] kept to their vigilant ways regardless of what others thought of their [memeConcept].
conflict(tag=meme_Chastity) ->An indulgent [foeLeader] sought to destroy the [memberNamePlural], thinking that their restraint was going to destroy the society of [place_name].

founderJoin(tag=meme_Chastity) ->[deity0_name] came to [place_name] in the form of a [weather] which lasted three days and three nights. [founderName], saint of the [memberNamePlural], recognized this as a sign that the [foeLeader] must give up or face punishment.

victory(tag=meme_Chastity) ->[founderName] chastised the [foeLeader] with fears of hell, disease and obsession. The [foeLeader] understood just how much [foeLeader_pronoun] had erred, and neutered [foeLeader_objective]self on the spot.

setup(tag=meme_Chastity) ->[founderName] was a priest on one of the Glitterworlds. As its denizens turned away from traditional ideoligion and society began to collapse, [founder_pronoun] too found [founder_objective]self falling to godlessness. It was then [founder_pronoun] realized that it was not godlessness, but spiritual and physical uncleanliness which was leading them to ruin.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Chastity) ->Recognizing that desire was the source of suffering, [founderName] assembled a group of zealous ascetics and chartered a ship to travel to the Rim, where [founder_possessive] established a grand sanatorium.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Chastity) ->My experiences with the courting traditions of different worlds led me to realize that
lesson(tag=meme_Chastity) ->to give into lust is to descend into animalhood
lesson(tag=meme_Chastity) ->[memeConcept] is a spiritual as well as a physical matter
lesson(tag=meme_Chastity) ->it's not enough to abstain from evil, sometimes it is also required to abstain from good
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Chastity) ->I think everyone who's clear of mind will realize this, sooner or later.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Chastity) ->The archotechs are beyond earthly needs and desires. Though machines, they don't even need power, for vanometrics provide for them.
archistFact(tag=meme_Chastity) ->Transcendence occurs when a machine persona's consciousness achieves perfect [memeConcept] of circuit and program.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Chastity) ->[inTheEnd], those who maintain purity will merge with the archotechs into a perfect, [memeAdjective], serene [weather]. The others will be destroyed.

animistBasis(tag=meme_Chastity) ->There are spirits all around us, in every thing and every person. The spirit of a neuter is clear like [clearThing]; it can easily overpower many gestor or phallor spirits.
animistFact(tag=meme_Chastity) ->The spirits bestow gifts upon those pure of mind. Surface appearance does not matter to them.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Chastity) ->[itIsSaid] those who revere the spirits shall join with them, in the form of a [weather] that moves eternally across the stars.
eschatologismBasis(tag=meme_Chastity) ->This world is tainted with filthy, overgrown desires. The only way for them to be purged is for this world to die with them.
eschatologismProphecy(tag=meme_Chastity)->We will not birth a new generation. None will be able to rebuild after our great cleansing [weather].
chthonianBasis(tag=meme_Chastity) ->There are vast things in the Universe's depths. Greater than mere gods. Filthy, ever-growing, and indulgent in their consumption of reality.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Chastity)->[weMustBe] chaste, for fresh birth attracts them, like bloodhounds.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Chastity)->[byWorshipping] them, perhaps we could find out how they reproduce, and sterilize them.
esotericismBasis(tag=meme_Chastity) ->Beyond [clearThing], beyond the Veil, beyond desire, lies a [memeConcept] of knowledge.
esotericismFact(tag=meme_Chastity) ->These insights are hidden from those whose minds are occluded by desire.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Chastity)->By exploiting these occult concepts, we might finally free ourselves from our earthly needs.

introMemo(tag=meme_Chastity)->Regarding reports of employees not keeping up with the latest washcloth line - remember, cleanliness is next to godliness! (And before you ask: yes, fertility procedures are still covered by our insurance.)
atheismlessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Aphroditic)-> If there was a God, Xe would have prevented anti-neuter discrimination before it could occur.
